name: Sugarland Hidden Object Game
description:
Fun and addictive game Sugarland Hidden Object comes!
Carry sweet wishes and make them come true! Magic candy and boosters can help you achieve best sweet wishes.
Sugarland Hidden Object features:
• Sweet and delicious candies
• Small size but stunning effects
• Many new innovative gameplay
• Over 100 different and interesting levels
• Amazing candy game ever!
